description: A member of the http://anidb.net/ch1554 [PLANT Supreme Council] who serves as chairman of its National Defense Committee, and is thus the commander in chief of the http://anidb.net/ch1509 [ZAFT] forces. Having lost his wife Lenore in the Bloody Valentine tragedy, Zala is intent on revenge against the Naturals, and he is the leader of a radical faction of the Supreme Council which seeks to escalate the war against the http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance]. Zala represents the PLANTs of December City, where the http://anidb.net/ch1509 [ZAFT] forces are headquartered, and is the father of http://anidb.net/ch1509 [ZAFT] soldier http://anidb.net/ch300 [Athrun Zala].
name: Patrick Zala
